verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lay my life down, I lay my life down
All that I am dear Lord, it's yours
Mold me and make of me
What you would have me be
I lay my life at your feet, I lay my life down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I lay my life at your feet, I lay my life at your feet
No more to go dear Lord, I'm yours
Mold me and make of me
what you would have me be
I lay my life at your feet, I lay my life down.
